content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28, -61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) with burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (1, -60)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) with burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)

### Iron Smelting Area at (1, 1)
Consists of following entities:
- Three stone furnaces at (1, 1), (3, 1), and (2, 7)
- Three wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5), (3.5, 3.5), and (5.5, 3.5)
- Three burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5), (3.5, 2.5), and (5.5, 2.5)

### Copper Cable Production Line at (14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5) with burner inserter at (14.5, 12.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5) with burner inserter at (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line at (21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Input chest at (17.5, 14.5) with burner inserter at (16.5, 14.5)
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5) with burner inserter at (23.5, 15.5)

### Water Pumping System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Two offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5) and (2.5, 36.5)
- Multiple pipe networks connecting these pumps

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities:
- Belt networks running from mining areas to smelting areas
- Belt networks connecting smelting areas to assembly machines
- Belt networks for moving products between assembly machines

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing boilers near water
- Ensure boiler placement is not overlapping with water tiles
- Place boilers on solid ground adjacent to water sources
- Check the entity footprint before placement to ensure it doesn't intersect with water

### Errors with fluid systems
- Ensure offshore pumps are properly connected to pipe networks
- Check that fluid systems are properly connected end-to-end
- Verify pipe connections are not blocked by other entities

### Power system issues
- Multiple entities showing "not receiving electricity" warnings
- Ensure power poles are properly connected to form a complete electrical network
- Check that power generating structures are operational and connected to the grid
